name: Tick Tock Terror: Ada & The Clockwork Croc
name_original: Tick Tock Terror: Ada & The Clockwork Croc
description:
Made at the XX2012 Clockwork-themed gamejam by Constance Fleuriot, Teri Mardel & Kimmi Gan, this was our first go at making a game. We hadn't met before and managed to get this done over a very short weekend, having a great laugh along the way. It's a tiny bit steampunk and if we'd had the time (and expertise!) we'd have animated the crocodile.

Runs on Windows.
